headline: AI power and infrastructure needs boomed in 2025. At Davos, the AI story for 2026 remains the same.
summary: The AI industry's greatest bottleneck, power, drove a boom in infrastructure throughout 2025. At Davos, leaders signal that 2026 is likely to see more of the same.

headline: BlackRock Says Ethereum Is Wall Street’s Tokenization Backbone
summary: Tokenization means turning real-world assets such as U.S. Treasuries or investment funds into digital tokens that live on a blockchain, and BlackRock’s Ethereum tokenization has become a central theme in this shift. In its report, BlackRock said Ethereum supports about 65% of all tokenized assets. That dominance helps explain why ...

headline: Musk, Davos’ Most High-Profile Hater, to Make First Appearance
summary: Musk was confirmed as a last minute addition for a Thursday afternoon session, speaking to BlackRock Chief Executive Officer Larry Fink.  An appearance from Musk, the CEO of Tesla Inc., SpaceX and xAI, marks a major shift in the relationship between the world’s richest man and the event that draws world leaders, billionaires and global media to the mountains of Switzerland every January.  It comes on the tails of an appearance by his ally, US President Donald Trump, who spoke on Wednesday for well over an hour in a speech that covered everything from censorship to why the US should control Greenland.

content.title: Musk, Davos’ Most High-Profile Hater, to Make First Appearance

An appearance from Musk, the CEO of Tesla Inc., SpaceX and xAI, marks a major shift in the relationship between the world’s richest man and the event that draws world leaders, billionaires and global media to the mountains of Switzerland every January.  It comes on the tails of an appearance by his ally, US President Donald Trump, who spoke on Wednesday for well over an hour in a speech that covered everything from censorship to why the US should control Greenland.

headline: Why BlackRock is bullish on Ethereum in 2026 despite price stall
summary: Ethereum dominates tokenisation at 66% of market share. That’s despite poor price performance as the asset trades 40% below all-time high. AI, defence are also hot themes for investors.

content.title: Why BlackRock is bullish on Ethereum in 2026 despite price stall

headline: Musk to attend Davos for first time after years of criticizing WEF
summary: Jan 22 () - Elon Musk will attend the World Economic Forum in Davos for the first time on Thursday, ​marking a striking reversal for the billionaire who has ‌publicly criticized the annual gathering of political and business elites. The world's richest person ‌will join BlackRock CEO Larry Fink on a panel scheduled for 1530 GMT, according to the latest World Economic Forum program.

content.title: Musk to attend Davos for first time after years of criticizing WEF
content.summary: Jan 22 () - Elon Musk will attend the World Economic Forum in Davos for the first time on Thursday, ​marking a striking reversal for the billionaire who has ‌publicly criticized the annual gathering of political and business elites. The world's richest person ‌will join BlackRock CEO Larry Fink on a panel scheduled for 1530 GMT, according to the latest World Economic Forum program.

headline: Why BlackRock’s Larry Fink wants the entire financial system on ‘one common blockchain’
summary: Larry Fink is bullish on tokenisation. The trend is set to accelerate in 2026. A lack of infrastructure and regulations could hold it back.

content.title: Why BlackRock’s Larry Fink wants the entire financial system on ‘one common blockchain’
content.summary: Larry Fink is bullish on tokenisation. The trend is set to accelerate in 2026. A lack of infrastructure and regulations could hold it back.

thumbnail.caption: Tokenisation will reduce fees and democratise finance, according to BlackRock CEO Larry Fink. Illustration: Andrés Tapia; Photo: Shutterstock

headline: BlackRock's Fink Believes There's No Bubble Forming in AI Space
summary: BlackRock CEO Larry Fink says he "sincerely believes" there is no AI bubble. He talks about his support for AI and says there are no formal plans to move Davos to Detroit. He speaks with Bloomberg's Francine Lacqua on the sidelines of the 2026 World Economic Forum's annual meeting in Davos, Switzerland.

content.title: BlackRock's Fink Believes There's No Bubble Forming in AI Space

He speaks with Bloomberg's Francine Lacqua on the sidelines of the 2026 World Economic Forum's annual meeting in Davos, Switzerland.
